column3: “One of my favorite strands. Verry unique high. Ultra smooth smoke.”

“This was a great strain. made me feel very happy and care-free. I only gave it a 9 because it was a little over-priced. Most of the strains are at Harborside. Be prepared to spend no less than 14/g if you go there.”

“BoggleGum? The name cracks me up. In all fairness, it's a great strain. I picked some up in San Jose and was stoked because it was Clean Green certified. Bonus! The effect is a great balance between head and body. Your body slows down and your mind become free. Good stuff.”
“Maybe I didn't get a good crop, looked REAL good tho so I think it was legit...just not a strain for me...weak and short lasting.”

“Picked up a gram of some Boggle Gum wax. The smell and the flavor were PHENOMENAL! As soon as I cracked the puck half the room smelled, The smell itself is very hard to pinpoint. Slightly citrusy yet also somewhat cheesy with subtle undertones of Kush. The high itself was VERY creative. Going to be my new go to strain if I ever need to write. Overall I give this strain a 4.5/5”

“Nice mellow peaceful feel to this bud..  Very solid balanced hybrid great smoke for anytime..  For heavy smokers like myself its not my all time favorite because its easy to get used to its effects and the peak" high you can receive in my opinion although it is a wonderful high is meh.  This stuff does wonders for anxiety tho for a sativa heavy strain.  I recommend this strain for sure.”"
“Love the nice sweet taste... a nice, light high without being too much of a downer...”
“You can find this relaxing delicious smoke at Leaf Lab in San Jose.”
“Unfortunate, the nugs looked good but this is a lame strain for me. Packed no punch, held no length and overall a bad purchase.”
“Nice relaxing high.   Not much flavor via vaping.”
“Sweet smelling, gum-like taste. Mellow high with a lot of focus. Must be high in CBD? Not overpowering and lasts about 2-3 hours.”

“By and far, this is my favorite strain that I've found so far.  It is an Indica-heavy hybrid combination of BOGBubble and Northern Lights #5.  I can't even begin to explain the feeling, but each time I use it it seems to be better than the previous.  I only regret that it's difficult to find.  I found it at Elemental Wellness, but I purchased only 1g.  When I went back, they had sold out of the WHOLE batch, and were ...”
“Personally, I don't like the taste.  I'm not sure why.  But I like the high.  Smooth, happy, relaxed.  Just big on the happy.  I will definitely be adding this to my pain relievers.”

“Loved this smooth happy euphoric feelings. Great sensory boost to sight, sounds and touch.  You can get through a whole day with energy to do stuff, no hard crash at the end just a light fading out of being high. And no headaches :)”

“Near perfect but does stimulate my appetite - hense only 4-stars.  No anxiety or tenseness.  This is going in my keeper pile.
Update - Really difficult to locate strain”
“I love this strain. It gives me a comfortable and creative feeling. Slight bit of dry mouth. but overall one of my favs.”

“Pretty nice stuff, bought an eighth after smoking it with a buddy. Has a really mellow flavor, with an almost citrus-taste. The effects were instant, rushed right to my head and spun it like a top. Also had a nice body high to accompany it. One downside, however, was  how fast I built up tolerance to it, faster than anything else I've smoked, but overall, a great strain.”
“Leaves me really calm, content but inspired, and I definitely notice some pain management. Makes me SUPER sleepy.  Not my favorite tasting bud but definitely one I'll get again.”
“I won this at an event and found it surprisingly uplifting! Lucky me!!”
“It's awesome for a wake & bake”
